verses.verse: And Moses <S%H4872><s%> gathered <S%H6950><s%> all the congregation <S%H5712><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> together <S%H6950><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%> unto them <S%H1697><s%>, These are the words which the Lord <S%H3068><s%> has commanded <S%H6680><s%>, that you should do them <S%H6213><s%>.

Six <S%H8337><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> shall work <S%H4399><s%> be done <S%H6213><s%>, but on the seventh <S%H7637><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> there shall be to you a holy day <S%H6944><s%>, a sabbath <S%H7676><s%> of rest <S%H7677><s%> to the Lord <S%H3068><s%>: whoever does <S%H6213><s%> work <S%H4399><s%> in it shall be put to death <S%H4191><s%>.
You shall kindle <S%H1197><s%> no fire <S%H784><s%> throughout your habitations <S%H4186><s%> upon the sabbath <S%H7676><s%> day <S%H3117><s%>.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> spoke <S%H559><s%> unto all the congregation <S%H5712><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, This is the thing <S%H1697><s%> which the Lord <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

Take <S%H3947><s%> you from among you an offering <S%H8641><s%> unto the Lord <S%H3068><s%>: whoever <S%H3605><s%> is of a willing <S%H5081><s%> heart <S%H3820><s%>, let him bring <S%H935><s%> it <S%H8641><s%>, an offering of the Lord <S%H3068><s%>; gold <S%H2091><s%>, and silver <S%H3701><s%>, and brass <S%H5178><s%>,
And blue <S%H8504><s%>, and purple <S%H713><s%>, and scarlet <S%H8144><s%>, and fine linen <S%H8336><s%>, and goats <S%H5795><s%>' hair,
And rams <S%H352><s%>' skins <S%H5785><s%> dyed red <S%H119><s%>, and badgers <S%H8476><s%>' skins <S%H5785><s%>, and acacia <S%H7848><s%> wood <S%H6086><s%>,
And oil <S%H8081><s%> for the light <S%H3974><s%>, and spices <S%H1314><s%> for anointing <S%H4888><s%> oil <S%H8081><s%>, and for the sweet <S%H5561><s%> incense <S%H7004><s%>,
And onyx <S%H7718><s%> stones <S%H68><s%>, and stones <S%H68><s%> to be set <S%H4394><s%> for the ephod <S%H646><s%>, and for the breastplate <S%H2833><s%>.
And every wise <S%H2450><s%> hearted <S%H3820><s%> among you shall come <S%H935><s%>, and make <S%H6213><s%> all that the Lord <S%H3068><s%> has commanded <S%H6680><s%>;

The tabernacle <S%H4908><s%>, his tent <S%H168><s%>, and his covering <S%H4372><s%>, his clasps <S%H7165><s%>, and his boards <S%H7175><s%>, his bars <S%H1280><s%>, his pillars <S%H5982><s%>, and his sockets <S%H134><s%>,
The ark <S%H727><s%>, and the poles <S%H905><s%> there <S%H3727><s%>, with the mercy seat, and the veil <S%H6532><s%> of the covering <S%H4539><s%>,
The table <S%H7979><s%>, and his poles <S%H905><s%>, and all his vessels <S%H3627><s%>, and the showbread <S%H6440><s%>,
The lampstand <S%H4501><s%> also for the light <S%H3974><s%>, and his furniture <S%H3627><s%>, and his lamps <S%H5216><s%>, with the oil <S%H8081><s%> for the light <S%H3974><s%>,

And the incense <S%H7004><s%> altar <S%H4196><s%>, and his poles <S%H905><s%>, and the anointing <S%H4888><s%> oil <S%H8081><s%>, and the sweet <S%H5561><s%> incense <S%H7004><s%>, and the hanging <S%H4539><s%> for the door at the entering in <S%H6607><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%>,

The altar <S%H4196><s%> of burnt offering <S%H5930><s%>, with his bronze <S%H5178><s%> grate <S%H4345><s%>, his poles <S%H905><s%>, and all his vessels <S%H3627><s%>, the basin <S%H3595><s%> and his foot <S%H3653><s%>,
The hangings <S%H7050><s%> of the court <S%H2691><s%>, his pillars <S%H5982><s%>, and their sockets <S%H134><s%>, and the hanging <S%H4539><s%> for the door <S%H8179><s%> of the court <S%H2691><s%>,
The pins <S%H3489><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%>, and the pins <S%H3489><s%> of the court <S%H2691><s%>, and their cords <S%H4340><s%>,

The cloths <S%H899><s%> of service <S%H8278><s%>, to do service <S%H8334><s%> in the holy <S%H6944><s%> place <S%H6944><s%>, the holy garments <S%H899><s%> for Aaron <S%H175><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%>, and the garments <S%H899><s%> of his sons <S%H1121><s%>, to minister in the priest <S%H3547><s%>'s office.
And all the congregation <S%H5712><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> departed <S%H3318><s%> from the presence <S%H6440><s%> of Moses <S%H4872><s%>.

And they came <S%H935><s%>, every one <S%H376><s%> whose <S%H834><s%> heart <S%H3820><s%> stirred him up <S%H5375><s%>, and every one whom his spirit <S%H7307><s%> made willing <S%H5068><s%>, and they brought <S%H935><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>'s offering <S%H8641><s%> to the work <S%H4399><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%>, and for all his service <S%H5656><s%>, and for the holy <S%H6944><s%> garments <S%H899><s%>.

And they came <S%H935><s%>, both <S%H5921><s%> men <S%H582><s%> and women <S%H802><s%>, as many as <S%H3605><s%> were willing <S%H5081><s%> hearted <S%H3820><s%>, and brought <S%H935><s%> bracelets <S%H2397><s%>, and earrings <S%H5141><s%>, and rings <S%H2885><s%>, and tablets <S%H3558><s%>, all jewels <S%H3627><s%> of gold <S%H2091><s%>: and every man <S%H376><s%> that offered <S%H5130><s%> offered an offering <S%H8573><s%> of gold <S%H2091><s%> unto the Lord <S%H3068><s%>.

And every man <S%H376><s%>, with whom was found <S%H4672><s%> blue <S%H8504><s%>, and purple <S%H713><s%>, and scarlet <S%H8144><s%>, and fine linen <S%H8336><s%>, and goats <S%H5795><s%>' hair <S%H119><s%>, and red skins <S%H5785><s%> of rams <S%H352><s%>, and badgers <S%H8476><s%>' skins <S%H5785><s%>, brought them <S%H935><s%>.

Every one that did offer <S%H7311><s%> an offering <S%H8641><s%> of silver <S%H3701><s%> and brass <S%H5178><s%> brought <S%H935><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>'s offering <S%H8641><s%>: and every man <S%H4672><s%>, with whom was found acacia <S%H7848><s%> wood <S%H6086><s%> for any work <S%H4399><s%> of the service <S%H5656><s%>, brought it <S%H935><s%>.

And all the women <S%H802><s%> that were wise <S%H2450><s%> hearted <S%H3820><s%> did spin <S%H2901><s%> with their hands <S%H3027><s%>, and brought <S%H935><s%> that which they had spun <S%H4299><s%>, both of blue <S%H8504><s%>, and of purple <S%H713><s%>, and of scarlet <S%H8144><s%>, and of fine linen <S%H8336><s%>.
And all the women <S%H802><s%> whose heart <S%H3820><s%> stirred <S%H5375><s%> them up in wisdom <S%H2451><s%> spun <S%H2901><s%> goats <S%H5795><s%>' hair.

And the rulers <S%H5387><s%> brought <S%H935><s%> onyx <S%H7718><s%> stones <S%H68><s%>, and stones <S%H68><s%> to be set <S%H4394><s%>, for the ephod <S%H646><s%>, and for the breastplate <S%H2833><s%>;
And spice <S%H1314><s%>, and oil <S%H8081><s%> for the light <S%H3974><s%>, and for the anointing <S%H4888><s%> oil <S%H8081><s%>, and for the sweet <S%H5561><s%> incense <S%H7004><s%>.

The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> brought <S%H935><s%> a willing offering <S%H5071><s%> unto the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, every man <S%H376><s%> and woman <S%H802><s%>, whose <S%H834><s%> heart <S%H3820><s%> made them willing <S%H5068><s%> to bring <S%H935><s%> for all manner of work <S%H4399><s%>, which the Lord <S%H3068><s%> had commanded <S%H6680><s%> to be made <S%H6213><s%> by the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Moses <S%H4872><s%>.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, See <S%H7200><s%>, the Lord <S%H3068><s%> has called <S%H7121><s%> by name <S%H8034><s%> Bezaleel <S%H1212><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Uri <S%H221><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Hur <S%H2354><s%>, of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%>;

And he has filled <S%H4390><s%> him with the spirit <S%H7307><s%> of God <S%H430><s%>, in wisdom <S%H2451><s%>, in understanding <S%H8394><s%>, and in knowledge <S%H1847><s%>, and in all manner of workmanship <S%H4399><s%>;
And to devise <S%H2803><s%> skillful works <S%H4284><s%>, to work <S%H6213><s%> in gold <S%H2091><s%>, and in silver <S%H3701><s%>, and in brass <S%H5178><s%>,

And in the cutting <S%H2799><s%> of stones <S%H68><s%>, to set <S%H4390><s%> them <S%H2799><s%>, and in carving of wood <S%H6086><s%>, to make <S%H6213><s%> any manner of skillful <S%H4284><s%> work <S%H4399><s%>.

And he has put <S%H5414><s%> in his heart <S%H3820><s%> that he may teach <S%H3384><s%>, both he <S%H171><s%>, and Aholiab, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ahisamach <S%H294><s%>, of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Dan <S%H1835><s%>.

Them has he filled <S%H4390><s%> with wisdom <S%H2451><s%> of heart <S%H3820><s%>, to work <S%H6213><s%> all manner of work <S%H4399><s%>, of the engraver <S%H2796><s%>, and of the skillful workman <S%H2803><s%>, and of the embroiderer <S%H7551><s%>, in blue <S%H8504><s%>, and in purple <S%H713><s%>, in scarlet <S%H8144><s%>, and in fine linen <S%H8336><s%>, and of the weaver <S%H707><s%>, even of them that do <S%H6213><s%> any <S%H3605><s%> work <S%H4399><s%>, and of those that devise <S%H2803><s%> skillful work <S%H4284><s%>.
